mapper.select: SELECT tem.ID_TEM , tem.NAME_TEM , tem.CI_NAME_TEM , tem.CODE_TEM , tem.IS_ACTIVE_TEM , tem.CREATED_ON_TEM , tem.CREATED_BY_TEM , tem.UPDATED_ON_TEM , tem.UPDATED_BY_TEM , tem.ID_DIM_TEM , count(1) as recipient FROM TEAM_MASTER_TEM tem INNER JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT rct on rct.ID_TEM_RCT=tem.ID_TEM and rct.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT='80BC3490-9F53-4C92-8DBA-3D5C7755FD73' INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT tbr.ID_TEM_TBR AS ID_TEM_TBR FROM TEAM_MASTER_TEM tem1 INNER JOIN TEAM_BRAND_TBR tbr ON tbr.ID_TEM_TBR=tem1.ID_TEM AND tem1.IS_ACTIVE_TEM=1 INNER JOIN BRAND_MASTER_BRD brd ON brd.ID_BRD=tbr.ID_BRD_TBR AND brd.IS_ACTIVE_BRD=1 INNER JOIN BRANDMANAGER_BRAND_BBR bbr ON brd.ID_BRD = bbr.ID_BRD_BBR WHERE bbr.ID_USR_BBR = #{userId} ) a ON a.ID_TEM_TBR=tem.ID_TEM AND tem.IS_ACTIVE_TEM=1 group by tem.ID_TEM, tem.NAME_TEM, tem.CI_NAME_TEM, tem.CODE_TEM, tem.IS_ACTIVE_TEM, tem.CREATED_ON_TEM, tem.CREATED_BY_TEM, tem.UPDATED_ON_TEM, tem.UPDATED_BY_TEM, tem.ID_DIM_TEM

select tem.ID_TEM , tem.NAME_TEM , tem.CI_NAME_TEM , tem.CODE_TEM , tem.IS_ACTIVE_TEM , tem.CREATED_ON_TEM , tem.CREATED_BY_TEM , tem.UPDATED_ON_TEM , tem.UPDATED_BY_TEM , tem.ID_DIM_TEM from TEAM_MASTER_TEM tem join TEAM_BRAND_TBR tbr on tem.ID_TEM = tbr.ID_TEM_TBR join BRAND_MASTER_BRD brd on tbr.ID_BRD_TBR = brd.ID_BRD join BRANDMANAGER_BRAND_BBR bbr on brd.ID_BRD = bbr.ID_BRD_BBR where bbr.ID_USR_BBR = #{userID} and tem.IS_ACTIVE_TEM = 1
SELECT * FROM TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM JOIN DIVISION_MASTER_DIM DIM ON DIM.ID_DIM = TEM.ID_DIM_TEM WHERE IS_ACTIVE_TEM = 1
